name: The Last Survivors
description:
Kill the zombies and take on challenges by helping the last survivors in the city. The Last Survivors is a fun roguelite action game with an infinite power-up experience that is repeatable every time you play. Never stop, collect as much XP and Boosters to get stronger by choosing your upgrades to survive.

You will play the charismatic Ava, one of the last survivors born in the apocalypse.

The Last Survivors is a casual apocalyptic survival game with Roguelite elements.

Kill All the Zombies

Eliminate as many zombies as possible to survive.

Never stop

Collect as much XP and boosters as possible to get stronger.

Challenges

To win the game, complete the challenges by helping the last survivors who are still alive.
